text: Heliophanus brevis is a jumping spider species in the genus Heliophanus. It was first described by Wanda Wesołowska in 2003 in Ethiopia. ==References== Category:Salticidae Category:Fauna of Ethiopia Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Spiders described in 2003 Category:Taxa named by Wanda Wesołowska
title: Heliophanus brevis
